column4: Hi, I just downloaded Amarok and all the restricted codecs (+VLC) and Amarok won't play anything. VLC just play fine, but I'd like to use Amarok :)
anyone managed to make Amarok play anything at all?
unless on Ubuntu 8.04 since that had a old version that was rubbish
too bad, the interface looked nice :)
I had 8.04, and it worked great
yep good version of Banshee in the 9.04 repo
I just install Totem video player and Amarok plays mp3
if you got the codecs installed yeah
